  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:colos_en/140193</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:colos_en/140193</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Konično nihalo: Kvantitivna določitev sile vrvice</string>
            <string language="en">Conical pendulum: Quantitative determination of the constraint force</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Konisches Pendel: Quantitative Ermittlung 
der Begrenzung Kraft</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pendule conique : Détermination 
quantitative de la force de contrainte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pêndulo cónico: Determinação 
quantitative da força do confinamente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pendolo conical: Determinazione 
quantitativa della forza di vincolo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κωνικό εκκρεμές: Ποσοτικός προσδιορισμός της 
δύναμης περιορισμού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Péndulo cónico: Determinación 
cuantitativa de la fuerza del constreñimiento</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Matematična izpeljava zveze med obodno hitrostjo in centripetalno silo ter silo vrvice.</string>
            <string language="en">Mathematical approach to determine the relation between peripheral speed, centripetal force and force on string in case of conical pendulum.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">konično nihalo</string>
            <string language="en">conical pendulum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">sila vrvice</string>
            <string language="en">string force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">obodna hitrost</string>
            <string language="en">peripheral speed</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">colos</string>
            <string language="en">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">mehanika</string>
            <string language="en">mechanics</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematische Annäherung, zum der Relation 
zwischen Zusatzgeschwindigkeit, zentripetaler Kraft und Kraft auf 
Zeichenkette festzustellen falls vom konischen Pendel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Approche mathématique pour déterminer la 
relation entre la vitesse périphérique, la force centripète et la 
force sur la chaîne de caractères en cas de pendule conique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aproximação matemática para determinar a 
relação entre a velocidade periférica, a força centripetal e a 
força na corda caso que do pêndulo cónico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Metodo matematico per determinare il rapporto fra
velocità periferica, forza centripeta e forza su stringa nel caso del
pendolo conical.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματική προσέγγιση για να καθορίσει τη σχέση 
μεταξύ της απομακρυσμένης ταχύτητας, της κεντρομόλου δύναμης και 
της δύναμης στη συμβολοσειρά σε περίπτωση κωνικού εκκρεμούς.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Acercamiento matemático para determinar la 
relación entre la velocidad periférica, la fuerza centrípeta y la 
fuerza en cadena en caso de que del péndulo cónico.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">konisches Pendel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeichenkettekraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zusatzgeschwindigkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mechaniker</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pendule conique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">force de chaîne de caractères</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vitesse périphérique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mécanique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pêndulo cónico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">força da corda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">velocidade periférica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mecânicos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">pendolo conical</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">forza della stringa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">velocità periferica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">meccanici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κωνικό εκκρεμές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δύναμη συμβολοσειράς</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">απομακρυσμένη ταχύτητα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">péndulo cónico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">fuerza de la cadena</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">velocidad periférica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
